config.forgivingvoid.title: Forgiving Void
config.forgivingvoid.triggerAtDistanceBe: The distance to the minimum y level at which Forgiving Void should forgive the player and send them towards the sky.
config.forgivingvoid.damageOnFall.toolti: The amount of damage applied to the player when they land.
config.forgivingvoid.fallingHeight.toolt: The height from which the player will be falling after falling through the void.
config.forgivingvoid.preventDeath.toolti: Prevent death on void fall (limits damage to leave at least 0.5 hearts)
Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the overworld void (dimension 0).
config.forgivingvoid.triggerInNether.too: Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the nether void (dimension -1).
config.forgivingvoid.triggerInEnd.toolti: Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the end void (dimension 1).
config.forgivingvoid.disableVanillaAntiC: Set to true if players are rubber-banding while falling through the void. If you're hosting a public server, you should only do this if you have proper anti-cheat installed.
List of dimension ids to be allowed for Forgiving Void. Options triggerInOverworld etc. take priority.
config.forgivingvoid.dimensionDenyList.t: List of additional dimension ids to be deny-listed from Forgiving Void. Options triggerInOverworld etc. take priority. Ignored if dimensionAllowList is set.
